title: Caerphilly murder probe: Man arrested after woman found dead
article: A man has been arrested on suspicion of murdering a 43-year-old woman. The woman's body was found at a property on Doly-yr-Eos on Caerphilly's Mornington Meadows estate at about 00:10 BST on Sunday. Gwent Police said it had launched a murder investigation and a 42-year-old man was in custody. Detectives have asked anyone with information to contact them.
